original_text: Someone may have power over dangerous snakes. But that will not help him if the snake bites him first. Someone may have power over dangerous snakes. But that will not help him if the snake bites him first. Someone may have power over dangerous snakes.
korean_text: 주술을 베풀기 전에 뱀에게 물렸으면 술객은 소용이 없느니라

sentences.korean_translation: 어떤 사람은 힘을 가질 수 있다

sentences.original_text: But that will not help him
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 그것은 그를 도와주지 않을 것이다

sentences.original_text: if the snake bites him first
